reviews.review: This game is amazing, you can tell a lot of effort went into the level design.
VERY COOL BIG PLOT TWIST, EPIC  STORY, EVERYTHING IS GREAT

인생의 명작
갓.겜의.수식어가 가장 잘 어울리는 게임
If you haven't played it yet, just play it its worth every cent and minute spent on this game. And if you have a friend the co-op is amazing.

Depois de 13 hrs de jogo eu finalmente finalizei ele (mais que o dobro do 1 que terminei com 5hrs). Que jogo incrível, a história é fenômenal, o gráfico é bonito até nos dias de hj, o modo Coop é bem divertido e conseguiu me prender bem do início ao fim.

10/10 recomendo comprar o bundle que vem com os 2 games e normalmente fica por 6 pila na promoção.
buenísimo, solo le faltaría poner la opción del VSinc ya que en mi patata da tirónes al cambiar de prueva, pero aun asi va muy bien.
Witzig gemacht, der Kauf lohnt sich auf jeden Fall.
i like the blue orb thing
it is a very fun game and it is a good game
I like the game. Sometimes it does take a bit long to solve a puzzle, and it can get a bit boring, but the satisfaction of completing the task is big, and will make you always want to continue.
Good just because it made Josh sick.
made me feel sick. that all i have the say going through the portals casued me to get travel sick.

esta bueno, pero este juego no corre en cualquier pc :(
PD: como me muteo adentro del juego?
Из-за этой игры я получил пизды, от того что начал я играть вечером, а получил пизды утром, я ебал в рот, эта ахуенная игра, но блять я потерял сука счет времени

Portal 2 is good, like really good however I don`t like it as much as Portal 1 that don`t mean this is a bad game far from it I just prefer Portal 1. But I will say this game is One of The Greatest Games I Have Ever Played and I enjoyed my time so whenever I return to this game, I won`t doubt I will have a great time. Would highly recommend to anyone who played Portal 1 (Definitely Play Portal 1 Before This).

Holy fucking shit this game is amazing, visuals, game play, songs and so much more, I only wish they made a third game, but since the game ended with us leaving the facility, I don't think there will be one, anyways, great game 10/10.
Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing go out. Like a potato.
Un gameplay indémodable. Indispensable pour le fan de puzzle game.
игра хорошая и очень интересный геймплей
I'm suing aperture sceicne for not giving me my 60 dollars. I like this game better than the first and definitely need a portal 3.
This is the best game ever.
es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en su totalidad, de verdad encontras casi todo en este juego... Y ES ASOMBROSO VER COMO UN JUEGO DE PUZZLES TIENE UNA HISTORIA TAN BUENA COMO ESTA

It is fun and I like the open world aspect and I like playing with my friends.

this was the first game i have installed on steam and it was probably the best story-game i have played so far. the gameplay feels smooth and is fun, the story is really entertaining and the characters really funny and well written. i can only recomend this game to every human being with a pc. heck i'd even recommend this to my dog
Я думаю что эта игра самая лучшая хотя постойте это так и есть назовите хоть 1  намного лучше игру чем portal 2
muito bom o jogo, mesmo ele sendo um pouco antigo eu recomendo a todos
campanha curta porem excelente historia e personagens carismáticos

Классное продолжение ПО-НАСТОЯЩЕМУ КЛАССНОЙ ИГРЫ. Она сложнее, ГОРАЗДО сложнее Первой части. Я очень долго тупил на многих местах. И очень мало (ИЗИ) скипов. Но игра от этого не хуже)

The personality definitely carries over from the first game, and it's glorious. The puzzles are still amazing, and the new components to them fit just as well as the original ones. Highly recommended, a hilarious mind-bending adventure.
Very good, would reccomend to anyone wanting challenging puzzles as well as an amazing story and great graphics
